mapper.insert: insert into category (name, type, sort, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) values (#{category.name}, #{category.type}, #{category.sort}, #{category.createTime}, #{category.updateTime}, #{category.createUser}, #{category.updateUser})
mapper.select: select sort from category where sort = ${sort} limit 1
select id, name from category where type = #{type}
